blogPost.excerpt: We're here to help you experience the joy of second home ownership. With Pacaso, you own a second home for 1/8 of the cost, while avoiding the hassles of traditional ownership. We'll help you find the perfect fit. You decide how many shares you'd like to own.
blogPost.body: We're here to help you experience the joy of second home ownership. With Pacaso, you own a second home for 1/8 of the cost, while avoiding the hassles of traditional ownership. We'll help you find the perfect fit. You decide how many shares you'd like to own.
blogPost.title: Pacaso - The modern way to buy and own a second home
blogPost.author: Sarah Wright

localize.description: 我们在这里帮助您体验二手房所有权的乐趣。有了Pacaso，您只需花费1/8的成本就能拥有一套二手房，同时避免了传统置业的麻烦。我们会帮您找到最合适的房子。您决定您想拥有多少股份。
localize.tagline: 现代人购买和拥有第二套住房的方式。

localize.description: 我們在這裏幫助您體驗二手房所有權的樂趣。有了Pacaso，您只需花費1/8的成本就能擁有一套二手房，同時避免了傳統置業的麻煩。我們會幫您找到最合適的房子。您決定您想擁有多少股份。
localize.tagline: 現代人購買和擁有第二套住房的方式。

previous.excerpt: Accept payments anywhere online, no coding required. PriceBlocs helps you close more sales in any channel through our super low friction payment links. Accept Apple Pay and Google Pay in just a few clicks.
previous.title: PriceBlocs - Accept payments online with just a link

localize.description: 随时随地在线接受支付，无需编码。PriceBlocs通过我们超低摩擦的支付链接帮助您在任何渠道完成更多的销售。只需点击几下就能接受Apple Pay和Google Pay。
localize.tagline: 只需一个链接就能在线接受付款

localize.description: 隨時隨地在線接受支付，無需編碼。PriceBlocs通過我們超低摩擦的支付鏈接幫助您在任何渠道完成更多的銷售。只需點擊幾下就能接受Apple Pay和Google Pay。
localize.tagline: 只需一個鏈接就能在線接受付款

next.excerpt: Spend less time worrying about QA, PR reviews and API pipelines with Inso, the Insomnia CLI that integrates directly with your CI/CD pipeline with ease.
next.title: Insomnia CLI - Speed up API CI/CD pipeline development

localize.description: 使用Inso，Insomnia CLI可直接与您的CI/CD流水线轻松集成，减少对QA、PR审查和API流水线的担忧。
使用Inso，Insomnia CLI可直接與您的CI/CD流水線輕鬆集成，減少對QA、PR審查和API流水線的擔憂。
